data.name: Graffiti Bombing - All City Edition
data.detailed_description:
Get the full featured version of Graffiti Bombing with the All City Edition. This DLC unlocks all current features, plus gets new content as it becomes available during Early Access, and when the game goes to final release!


  • More zones, locations and different places to bomb graffiti (as they become available). *
  • All sub-areas unlocked for painting, so you can paint on walls, buildings, tunnels, trains, containers and more!
  • Private lift shortcut from the Bunker Base to the Train Yard gets you out and about quickly.
  • Use all the different paint types: FT-ACTION 71 (Regular / Multi-purpose), Slick Rick! (Gloss), Rack-a-lak (Matt), Zero2Hero (Metallic).
  • The Outlines Torch Project is a new tool that can be used to project imported outlines onto walls and surfaces. *
  • Pick from different cap types (more coming soon), along with custom caps and a tool for creating. *
  • Undo / redo system to make sure those outlines and details are perfect.
  • Time of day can be changed, gain experience in different light conditions.
  • Rack up at the Bombastic - Graffiti Supplies vending machine, to top-up paint supplies.
  • Look for objects that you can stand on, or stack, ladders to climb and a mobile scissor lift. *
  • Submit your best pieces to the official Graffiti Bombing website, for a chance to enter the renown Hall of Fame.
  • More details on exclusive DLC features to follow, as Early Access development continues.

Note: any items marked with * are still under development. DLC customers also get invited to game beta builds, and so get early access to new content and game features!

data.short_description: Get the full featured version of Graffiti Bombing with the All City Edition. This DLC unlocks all current features, plus gets new content as it becomes available during Early Access, and when the game goes to final release!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4590 / AMD FX™-8350
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c) or better
  • Additional Notes: Graffiti Bombing is technically demanding and requires a decent rig to run. If your running minimum specs then expect to lower in-game resolution and settings to maintain a high frame-rate. Solid State Drive (SSD) required for optimal performance and better experience.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-4770K / AMD Ryzen™ 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c) or better
  • Additional Notes: If you're running a recommended or higher-end rig, you can adjust in-game resolution and settings for better quality. Solid State Drive (SSD) required for optimal performance and better experience.
